availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John K. Thomasson (Hopkins/ Webster County, Ky, merchant )

body.p: Hopkins County and Webster County, Kentucky, merchant. Kentucky native. Son of David H. Thomasson and Mary C. Thomasson. Resident of Hopkins County, Kentucky, in 1850. Merchant in Webster County in 1860. Household owned four enslaved persons in Webster County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, District 2, p. 123A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Webster County, p. 523.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Webster County, p. 481B.
"John K Thomasson (1831-1910)," Find A Grave, Memorial #41676750, accessed December 14, 2021, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/41676750.
